posts.message: Why dark editor/IDE themes are much more popular than light themes? I can't find one that I like!
You Terminal deserves some care, too. Bashstrap, a quick way to spruce up OS X terminal and add time-saving features.
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: bashstrap - Bootstrap for your terminal. A quick way to spruce up OSX terminal. It cuts out the fluff, adds in timesaving features, and provides a solid foundation for customizing your terminal style. Based on Mathias Bynens epic dotfiles - https://github.com/mathiasbynens/dotfiles
